column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This maybe the best food on EARTH.  All of their dishes are amazing and so is the sangrias!    I think going here with a friend or two to split everything
column2: but I've also ordered take out here and you can't go wrong here... mmmmm  Average tab for two people like $70 without tip....INCLUDES SOME DRINKS....more if you are an alky...
